item.title: MIUI V13.0.1.0.SJGMIXM Fastboot update for POCO X3 NFC Global
item.description:

Device: POCO X3 NFC Global

Codename: surya

Version: V13.0.1.0.SJGMIXM | 12.0

Size: 4.9 GB

MD5: 8d55b24a6352d6233d52029089874192

item.title: MIUI V13.0.1.0.SJGMIXM Recovery update for POCO X3 NFC Global
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: POCO X3 NFC Global

Codename: surya

Version: V13.0.1.0.SJGMIXM | 12.0

Size: 2.9 GB

MD5: e6fc65cbd394fde71962a9295676a5df

Changelog:
[MIUI 13]
New: "Crystallization" super wallpapers
New: A new widget ecosystem with app support
Optimization: Improved overall stability
[System]
Stable MIUI based on Android 12
Updated Android Security Patch to July 2022. Increased system security.
[Wallpaper]
New: "Crystallization" live wallpapers
[More features and improvements]
New: Apps can be opened as floating windows directly from the sidebar
Optimization: Enhanced accessibility support for Phone, Clock, and Weather
Optimization: Mind map nodes are more convenient and intuitive now

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V12.0.7.0.RJGEUXM Recovery update for POCO X3 NFC EEA
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: POCO X3 NFC EEA

Codename: surya

Version: V12.0.7.0.RJGEUXM | 11.0

Size: 2.5 GB

MD5: 641da640cd9c90618ad06f989f6ead0b

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Full screen gestures are now ignored on the Lock screen alarm page
Optimization: Updated Android Security Patch to April 2021. Increased system security.
Stable MIUI based on Android 11
Stable MIUI based on Android 11
[Control center]
New: Swipe down from the upper left corner to open Notification shade and from the upper right corner to open Control center
New: An option that allows you to restrict opening Control center while on the Lock screen
[Dark mode]
Optimization: Brightness and color improvements for wallpapers in Dark mode
[Status bar, Notification shade]
New: An option to switch between connected devices in the notification about media playback
GPS toggle renames as "Location"

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
